title: iReckon
description: Arising from the brutality of their childhood, two adversaries, Wood and Hoary, giants in the commercial world, a banker and an entrepreneur, uncompromisingly drive to build their world stages. The financial tsunami is raging, threatening their ambitions, driving unprecedented pitfalls. Political leaders are thumping tables, pounding the globe and spending trillions. Across the world people are being hurt as the industrial nations face collapse. God is watching; he is getting interested. Money, greed, materialism and blame distract the truth. The visions of Hoary and Wood present a new world though the tumultuous wave demands that they must risk everything. Amidst the turbulence, Helen emerges, her beauty paralyzing men and as Wood's empire falls, he has to know why she remains besotted with him...
author: Greg Heywood
